actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to modify the Houston Ship Channel navigation project to maintain a forty-foot project depth in the Bayport Ship Channel.

summary.text: Modifies the Houston Ship Channel navigation project to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to perform such dredging operations as are necessary to maintain a 40-foot project depth in the Bayport Ship Channel.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Houston Ship Channel navigation project to maintain a forty-foot project depth in the Bayport Ship Channel.
